sections.title: Our Story
sections.text: Canil Galega began with a simple dream: to share the joy and loyalty of Golden Retrievers with families across Portugal. As a family-owned kennel, our roots are grounded in love, responsibility, and a deep respect for animal welfare. What started as a small passion project quickly grew into a trusted name, known for raising healthy, social, and affectionate puppies. Each pup is born and raised in a nurturing home environment, surrounded by children, adults, and other pets to ensure early socialization and emotional balance. Our story is one of dedication, growth, and a whole lot of tail-wagging happiness.

sections.title: Our Philosophy
sections.text: We believe that every puppy deserves more than just a home — they deserve a beginning filled with affection, guidance, and respect. Our philosophy combines ethical breeding practices, positive reinforcement, and early-stage socialization to nurture the best in every dog. We do not mass-produce; we raise with purpose. Every decision, from diet to veterinary care, is made with the puppy’s long-term health and happiness in mind. We see our role not just as breeders, but as caretakers of future companions — and we treat each one as part of our extended family.

feedbacks.name: Maria Silva
feedbacks.text: We had an incredible experience with Canil Galega. From the very first conversation, the team was transparent, warm, and extremely helpful. They provided us with weekly updates, photos, and tips to help us prepare for our puppy’s arrival. Our Golden Retriever is not only healthy but exceptionally well-socialized. You can tell he came from a place filled with love and care. We couldn’t be happier!
